name: Monster Dungeon (GameDemon)
description:
Game I am working on for the mobile platform. Turned into a pc build for easy testing.

Play as a boss and defend your boss room from waves of adventurers.

Assets made my friend Nick Deforest and these asset packs from the unity store.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/fantasy-medieval-character-p...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/rogue-fantasy-castle-16472...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/rpg-worlds-caves-167274#de...
